text:
@realDonaldTrump U ruined the economy 
1st u ignored coronavirus warnings for 70 days
2nd so tens of thousands of people died. 
3rd so consumers stay in to stay well.
4th so 40 million workers lose their jobs.
5th so U.S. economy tanks

ALL BECAUSE U WOULDN'T HEED EXPERT ADVICE. UR FAULT.
